pages.title: Roadmap to data science
pages.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step How to prepare for a data science job This is a roadmap for data science. To learn Course 1: SQL Course 2: Web scraping Course 3: Python Course 4: Pandas and visualization Course 5: Statistical data analysis Course 6: Machine learning Course 7: Deep learning Course 8: Big data Happy analyzing!

pages.title: About
pages.text: I am a graduate student at UofT and I started this blog to write about data science.

pages.title: First Post-Part 3
pages.text: This post contains a jupyter notebook. This is a sample notebook Let's import some modules. In [1]: import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt % matplotlib inline In [2]: print ( 'Hello World' ) Hello World
